products.title: Stockholm Grey Roller Blind
products.description: A highly popular range, loved by their customers for its simplicity and value for money, their stockholmfabrics come in a wide range of colours suitable for all rooms including kitchens and bathrooms. This grey roller blind blends perfectly with any style or taste, whether your decor is on the modern, minimalist side or if you prefer to add bright and bold accessories. This roller blind with accompanying white components and grey fabric colour is a easy and quick way to update your window.

products.title: Stockholm Cream Roller Blind
products.description: Stockholm cream is a beautiful neutral colour, and works perfectly with cool greys but also natural and wood tones. A real all rounder & great for injecting colour into any room. Their stockholm cream roller blind is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. Their roller blinds come with various control options, including a spring pull acorn which removes the need for any cords maing them inherently child safe.

products.title: Stockholm Frost Roller Blind
products.description: Stockholmfrost is an attractive, clean and crisp white colour. It will freshen up any space within the home or office. Stockholm frost fabric is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. Their roller blinds come with various control options, including a spring pull acorn which removes the need for any cords making them inherently child safe. As with all their made to measure products this blind comes with a 5 year guarantee giving extra peace of mind when investing in this product.

products.title: Stockholm Rock Grey Roller Blind
products.description: Their moisture-resistant, stockholm rock roller blind is a stunning mid grey hue. It's a modern, on trend colour choice & will be a perfect finishing touch for your window. Their roller blinds come with various control options, including the option of a rust free chain so you can get just the perfect finishing touches for your window. This blind also comes with 5 year guarantee as standard, giving you peace of mind that you blind is built to last.

products.title: Stockholm Mid Grey Roller Blind
products.description: Stockholm mid grey roller blinds are a beautiful contemporary cool grey colour. A timeless grey colour that will compliment most color palettes within the home or office. Their roller blinds can be manufactured with smooth control chains which ensures you get the desired finish for your space. Also, their made to measure blinds come with a 5 year guarantee providing additional peace of mind when investing in this product.

products.title: Stockholm Snow White Roller Blind
products.description: Stockholm snow is a beautiful fresh white colour, it will work perfectly in most spaces. A real all rounder & great for brightening up any room. Stockholm snow fabric is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. As with all their made to measure products this blind comes with a 5 year guarantee which covers all parts of the blind. products.title: Valencia French Cream Roller Blind
products.description: This valencia roller blind is light cream; think of an extremely milky coffee. Some might say buff or ecru, whatever you call it, it's a very nice neutral shade that adds just enough colour to the window. This colourway is beautiful in both modern settings and homes that favour this valencia roller blind is light cream; think of an extremely milky coffee.

products.title: Valencia Spring Green Roller Blind
products.description: Fresh and fruity, this valencia spring green roller blind will give your home a bright burst of colour. Combine this blind with more earthy tones to give your room a bold and funky accent or use it to create a vibrant and vivid interior with other striking colours.

products.title: Valencia Sangria Roller Blind
products.description: The valencia sangria roller blind is warm red in colour. Clearly this blind has a vibrant tone but its also a sophisticated choice that will add richness to a scheme. This juicy colour will be a wonderful accent to a room of soft browns and neutral or maybe lighter whites or the valencia sangria roller blind is warm red in colour.

products.title: Valencia Orange Embers Roller Blind
products.description: Choose their striking orange roller blind to add a stunning splash of colour. Its as bright as bright can be. This blind will add a funky zing to any interior; think family rooms, breakfast rooms, rooms featuring strong blocks of colour as well as childrens bedrooms.

products.title: Valencia Orchid Pink Roller Blind
products.description: If hot pink is too bright and baby pink too delicate, this valencia orchid pink roller blind is the perfect solution for you. The fabric is positively blushing, helping you to add a gentle and relaxing flash of colour to your home whilst filling your room with a feminine charm.

products.title: Valencia Simplicity Red Roller Blind
products.description: This red roller blind is so vibrant with its hot scarlet colour. Think of a post box but much brighter. Red is for passion and there's no mistaking the raciness of this blind. Red is a popular accent colour in kitchens and studies, this may just be what you've been looking for this red roller blind is so vibrant with its hot scarlet colour.

products.title: Rimini, Storm Cloud - Roller Blind
products.description: The rimini's storm cloud is moody, broody, and full of atmosphere, just as its name might suggest. That said, it's still light enough that it won't black out your room when closed, with some light still able to peer through. Settle the storm cloud amongst paler greys and whites for a modern, monochrome living room, or pair with brick reds, bright oranges, or pale yellows for a cool retro bedroom.

products.title: Rimini, Sand - Roller Blind
products.description: Rimini sand's pale yellow-cream hue is a pretty, uplifting addition to any window. Its light translucency means that plenty of light penetrates it, even when closed, so you'll never be lacking in sunshine. Pair sand with navy blues and light-coloured woods for a modern look with a unique twist, or with browns, greens, and golds for something classic and luxurious. Either of these would be the perfect look for the living room or dining room in a contemporary, stylish home.

products.title: Rimini, Azure - Roller Blind
products.description: The pale blue of the rimini in azure will make you see bright white clouds the more you look at it. It really is the colour of that blue sky we hope to wake up to every day, and with this in your room, you might just be able to fool yourself. Nestle amongst white walls and pale woods to really emulate that outdoors feel, or pair with sunny yellows to create a pretty, cheerful atmosphere. Perfect for waking up to in a bedroom or a subtly coloured nursery; or for a cool, clean look in a contemporary dining room.

products.title: Rimini, Turquoise - Roller Blind
products.description: The bright aqua of the rimini in turquoise gives a cheery and contemporary look to a window. The smooth fabric is hardy enough to keep out the brighter sun rays, yet lightweight enough to allow a little light to still penetrate through. Pair with greens and browns for a fun, jungle theme, or with stark whites and pale, ice blues for a striking look and a cool, fresh atmosphere. This is perfect for a current, clean look in a bedroom or as part of an aquatic look in a bathroom.

products.title: Rimini, Coffee - Roller Blind
products.description: Think luxurious, rich, creamy cappuccino, and you've got the feel of the rimini in coffee. This is the perfect neutral shade - soft enough to fit well amongst other, richer shades, yet distinct enough to work as a colour all by itself. Nestle amongst rich browns, pale creams, and vintage golds to really make the most of this subtle hue, which makes a beautiful, sophisticated accent for a bedroom or living room window.

products.title: Rimini, Chocolate - Roller Blind
products.description: You'll be left craving the rich luxury of dark cocoa when you see the rimini in chocolate. Think cosy nights in by a warm fire, a great movie, and the family gathered round; this is the kind of atmosphere the chocolate brings to mind. Pair up with creams, golds, and beiges for a classic yet contemporary finish. This is the perfect shade for a tranquil living room; a snug, homely bedroom; or a warm, swish home office.

products.title: Rimini, Miami Yellow - Roller Blind
products.description: Well, the name says it all. The rimini's miami yellow is bright, funky, and summery. Due to its lightweight but sturdy fabric, it has a surprising level of opaqueness, despite its light colour. Not that you'll notice, with the colour of sunshine in your window. This is the ideal hue for creating a sunny, cheery kitchen, or a fun, energetic home office. Pair with creams and pretty florals for some country chic, or with sky blue shades for a fun, summery feel.

products.title: Rimini, Tangerine - Roller Blind
products.description: Add some summer cheer to any room with the rimini in tangerine. This fruity shade is fun, fresh, and just a little bit retro. And it's such a bright, sunny colour that it will make a great substitute for the sunshine when it's pulled down. Co-ordinate with rich browns and clean whites for a great, unique look in a living room, or pair with other brights, such as limes and yellows, in a kids' bedroom or playroom to create a fun and playful atmosphere.

products.title: Rimini, Ocean - Roller Blind
products.description: The rimini's ocean is a deep, intriguing indigo blue, with a mysterious midnight feel to the hue. Its dark shade will certainly keep most of the light out, whilst offering privacy when needed, too. The durability of this no-fuss blind is perfect for a window covering that could get a lot of use. Mix the ocean with pale, icy blues; bright, stark whites; and light, neutral greys. Or, for a striking look, pair with a bright poppy red or a pretty, sunshine yellow.

products.title: Rimini, Jade - Roller Blind
products.description: If fresh and immaculate is the look you're going for, then look no further than the pretty pastel of the rimini roller-blind in jade. It adds a splash of colour without taking over the room or creating too intense a look, and allows just a slip of light to penetrate through. Team this beauty with pastel pinks, colourful florals, and neutral beiges and creams to provide a subtle accent to its complementary hues.

products.title: Rimini, Powder Blue - Roller Blind
products.description: Rimini's powder blue is a cool, icy hue that brings a clean, fresh vibe to any room it's used in. Offering privacy whilst still allowing plenty of light through, you'll have no concerns about shadows or darkness in your room when it's closed. Complement navy blues, aqua shades, and deep sapphires to create a neat, coordinated look in a bedroom or living room. It will also work beautifully with bright whites for a subtle, crisp style that's perfect for a modern kitchen or bathroom.

products.title: Rimini, Midnight - Roller Blind
products.description: The rimini in midnight is a deep, dark hybrid between navy blue and charcoal grey, making it interesting enough to make a statement, and, though not strictly a blackout blind, still dark enough to work on a practical level in keeping the light out. Blend the midnight amongst pale greys, barely-there blues, and naked whites, or complement deep reds and vivid greens. A great colour for a contemporary home office, or for stopping that sunshine from waking you up in the bedroom.

products.title: Rimini, Wine - Roller Blind
products.description: Rich and opulent, the rimini wine is a shade for the most sophisticated of homes. This splendidly dark blind not only offers privacy when you need it, but also tames even the brightest rays of sunlight. The rimini wine works beautifully with pale neutrals, and makes for a plush, abundant look in a living room or dining room. Pair with light woods and stark whites for a modern look, or with darker woods and warm creams for a more traditional feel.

products.title: Rimini, Apple - Roller Blind
products.description: The rimini's apple really is apple green. This perfectly fruity shade is lively and refreshing, and might just have you yearning for a cool glass of apple juice. The durability of the blind makes it a worthwhile investment, with its fuss-free usability and quality finish being added bonuses. Use the apple in the kitchen, paired with pale yellows and crisp whites, for a garden-fresh country feel, or in the bedroom, where the sun peeking through will give you the perfect start to the day.

products.title: Rimini, Rose - Roller Blind
products.description: The pretty vintage of the rimini rose provides a strikingly elegant look, its dusky pink hue giving any room a warm, rosy glow. The long-lasting, resilient fabric has a smooth, effortless finish, allowing light to gently penetrate through. This blind is perfect for country chic designed rooms where it will be surrounded by cute florals and rich creams. Lovely in a bloom-filled bedroom, a light and airy hallway, or a rustic kitchen, this colour will go well with pale neutrals and country greens.

products.title: Rimini, Black - Roller Blind
products.description: The rimini in black is a classic jet black, rich in both depth and clarity of colour. Yet the fabric is still lightweight enough that it won't block out all of the light from the great outdoors. Ideal for an upstairs bedroom where a good night sleep is a must, the rimini black can serve as a bold new take on a coloured feature wall, or alternatively can be coupled and offset with a range of off-whites and greys to provide a very sleek and modern feel to a bedroom.

products.title: Rimini, Terracotta - Roller Blind
products.description: Go traditional with the rimini in terracotta. Reminiscent of beautiful, sunny mediterranean kitchens, this rich, cheerful shade is dark enough to keep too much light out, yet summery enough to brighten your room all year round. Put together with pretty greens and creams for an impressive country kitchen, or with creams walls and dark woods for a classic look in the dining room. Don't forget to add in some other terracotta elsewhere in the room to really bring out the colour of the blind.

products.title: Rimini, White - Roller Blind
products.description: The rimini in white is a soft, fresh shade, perfect for adding light and air to any room it's placed in. Its pale colour and lightweight fabric mean that the room doesn't have to be dark every time you need a little privacy. Brighten up even the gloomiest of rooms by placing this blind in the window; it's ideal for small utility rooms or bathrooms. Alternatively, surround with pretty florals or bold bright shades in the bedroom or living room.

products.title: Rimini, Dove - Roller Blind
products.description: The rich simplicity of the rimini in dove is all you need for any room. Neither dark nor light, it allows just a little light to penetrate, and provides you with the privacy you need, when you need it. And this resilient, quality blind will last you well, year upon year. There aren't many colours or styles that the moderating monochrome of the dove won't work with. Set off bright reds, complement deep purples, or tame dazzling limes.

products.title: Rimini, Almond - Roller Blind
products.description: The rimini almond is a classic, creamy white offering that's sure to add a touch of elegance to any room. Its fine texture makes it soft to the touch, yet it retains the durability typical of the rimini range. Combine with bold patterns for effortless period chic, or with browns, beiges, and golds for a modern, opulent look. The almond's luxurious finish will particularly suit a living room or bedroom where relaxing is the main goal, but of course would work well in any room amongst most colour schemes.

products.title: Rimini, Cream - Roller Blind
products.description: By embracing the simple things in life rimini cream brings you a little touch of luxury right where you need it as you craft your interiors to reflect who you really are. A delicately woven fabric plays host to the rich and calming nature of cream as your mind drifts off to your own personal oasis. Cream works in any room where you want to add that gentle homely touch that brings the rest of your decor together.

products.title: Stockholm Pebble Grey Roller Blind
products.description: Stockholm pebble grey is a beautiful saturated red shade, and works perfectly with cool greys but also natural and wood tones. A real all rounder - great for injecting colour into any room. Their stockholm pebble grey roller blind is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. As with all their made to measure products this blind comes with a 5 year guarantee which covers all parts of the blind.

products.title: Stockholm Paper White Roller Blind
products.description: Stockholm paper is a light, off white colour. It will brighten up any room wonderfully, there is nothing fresher or more clean looking than white when dressing a window. Their stockholm paper fabric is also moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. As with all their made to measure products this blind comes with a 5 year guarantee which covers all parts of the blind ensuring you are purchasing a product that wwill stand the test of time.

products.title: Stockholm Solar Yellow Roller Blind
products.description: Their best-selling stockholm range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish, perfect for adding style inside and inside your home. This bright, sunny, yellow roller blind brightens any room, making this quality dimout made to measure roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control. Our roller blinds are great for privacy and light control, and come with sleek white components.

products.title: Stockholm Sapphire Roller Blind
products.description: Stockholm sapphire blue is a beautiful colour, and works erfectly with cool greys but also natural and wood tones. A real all rounder & great for injecting colour into any room. Their stockholm sapphire blue roller blind is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. As with all their made to measure products this blind comes with a 5 year guarantee which covers all parts of the blind.

products.title: Stockholm Mellow Yellow Roller Blind
products.description: This pastel mellow yellow roller blind will brighten any room and offers wonderful light filtering, and moisture resistant properties meaning you can can achieve complete privacy without completely blocking light from coming into the room. This stockholm dusty yellow fabric will look stunning paired with natural wooden tones or will offer a perfect splash of colour when hung in a cool, compemporary grey scheme.

products.description: Stockholm smoke blue is a soft blue shade, and works perfectly with cool greys but also natural and wood tones. A real all rounder - great for injecting colour into any room. Their roller blinds come with various control options, including a spring pull acorn which removes the need for any cords maing them inherently child safe.

products.description: Stockholm dove grey is a light soft grey shade, and works perfectly with cool greys but also natural and wood tones.
